comments.author: aschneider83@web.de
comments.text: Created attachment 574377 back-button-user-chrome.PNG User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:5.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/5.0 Build ID: 20110615151330 Steps to reproduce: I updated firefox 5 to firefox 8 Actual results: The userchrome.css edited back button is not displayed properly. The used code in userchrome.css is: #back-button{ background-color: #00ff00!important; } #back-button[disabled="true"] { background-color: #ffffff !important; Image of bug: Expected results: backbutton should have looked like this:

comments.raw_text:
Are you really running Firefox 5? You should update ASAP. There are known security issues with that version

As version 5 is no longer supported, please test with the latest release
